questions.question: Hi there! Which of the following category would you like to donate to: 'Environment', 'Arts, Culture, Humanities', 'Religion', 'Human Services', 'Education', 'Animals', 'International', 'Health', 'Community Development', 'Human and Civil Rights', 'Research and Public Policy'?
questions.name: category

questions.question: Would you like to donate to a 'small', 'mid' or 'big' organization?
questions.name: size
